articles.content: U.S. Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick defended President Donald Trumps new tariffs on more than 180 countries Wednesday on Fox News, and made a particularly baffling claim that is already being r… [+5326 chars]

articles.title: Macron calls on EU companies to freeze investments in US - politico.eu
articles.description: French president says Europe shouldn’t invest in America “for some time until we have clarified things.”
articles.content:
Macron's comments are seen as an attempt to dissuade French tycoons from cozying up to Trump, potentially to try to cut private deals, outside regular EU trade policy.
